1845368.effect:
If your opponent controls a card: Until the end of this turn, each player can activate the following effect once per Chain.
● If a card(s) is sent to your opponent's GY, except "Wind Surge" or Spells/Traps sent to the GY immediately after resolving: You can target 1 of those cards; Set it to your field, also for the rest of this turn, you cannot Set cards with that same card type (Monster/Spell/Trap).
1845368.name: Wind Surge

1845366.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: You can place this card in your opponent's unoccupied Pendulum Zone face-up. This card's ATK and DEF is equal to the combined Pendulum Scales of all cards in both player's Pendulum Zones x 100.
1845366.name: Pendulum Rogue Scale
1845366.pendulum_effect: Cards in your Pendulum Zone cannot be targeted by, or destroy by, your card effects. Once per turn: You can make this card's Pendulum Scale become 0 or 13. Once per turn, during your End Phase, if you do not control a Pendulum Monster: Destroy 1 card in your hand or on your field, except a card in your Pendulum Zone.

1845357.effect: If your opponent controls more cards than you do: Send 2 monsters with different names to the GY from your hand, Deck, and/or field, then, if you control no Link Monsters, Special Summon up to 2 "Amazoness" Fusion Monsters with different names from your Extra Deck in Defense Position that list those sent monsters as Fusion Material (This is treated as an Fusion Summon.), and if you did not send a card from your Deck to the GY this way, all "Amazoness" monsters you currently control gain 300 ATK and DEF for each Fusion Monster on the field. You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except "Amazoness" monsters. You can only use activate 1 "Amazoness Fusion" per turn.
1845357.name: Amazoness Fusion

1845360.effect:
1 Fusion Monster + 1 "Amazoness" monster you control
Must first be Fusion Summoned. While you control a monster that is not an "Amazoness" monster, or have a non-"Amazoness" monster in your GY, this card cannot attack. During your Battle or End Phase, OR during your opponent's turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation. You can only use this effect of "Amazoness Ancestress" once per turn. If this Fusion Summoned card you control is sent to your GY by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Amazoness Empress" or "Amazoness Pet Liger" from your Extra Deck or GY in Defense Position.
1845360.name: Amazoness Ancestress

1845430.effect:
2 monsters with the same ATK but different names
This card's original ATK/DEF are equal to the ATK of the monsters used as material while they were on field. While this card has material, it can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase, but it cannot Attack directly. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; double its ATK and DEF until the end of the next turn. If a monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can gain LP equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster while it was on the field. You can only Summon "Multiplyguy(s)" once per turn.
1845430.name: Multiplyguy

1845429.effect:
2 monsters with the same DEF but different names
This card's original ATK/DEF are equal to the DEF of the monsters used as material while they were on field. While this card has material, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster whose current ATK or DEF is different from their original ATK or DEF. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; halve its ATK and DEF until the end of the next turn. When an attack is declared involving a monster you control: You can gain LP equal to the DEF of your battling monster. You can only Summon "Divideguy(s)" once per turn.
1845429.name: Divideguy

863853.effect: Special Summon 1 "Great Dezard" from your hand or Deck, then Special Summon 2 "Lich Tokens" (Zombie/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 1500) to your opponent's side of the field in Defense Position, and if you do, this turn "Great Dezard" are unaffected by card effects, also they can attack twice during this Battle Phase. You can banish this card from your GY; change 1 face-up "Fushioh Richie" you control to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Rise of the Nosferatu Lich" once per turn.
863853.name: Rise of the Nosferatu Lich

863846.effect:
When this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 card on your opponent's side of the field; banish it face-down. You can only use this effect of "The Great Nosferatu Lich, Fushioh Richie" once per turn. If this card was Special Summoned from the GY by the effect of "Fushioh Richie", it gains the following effect:
● Once per turn, if your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, then banish 1 card your opponent controls face-down.
863846.name: The Great Nosferatu Lich, Fushioh Richie
863846.treated_as: The Great Nosferatu Lich, Fushioh Richie

863859.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Rise of the Nosferatu Lich" from your Deck to your hand. You can target 1 face-down monster you control; change it to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, you can Set 1 Spell/Trap that lists "Fushioh Richie" in its card text from your GY to your side of the field. You can only use each effect of "The Great Nosferatu Lich's Castle" once per turn.
863859.name: The Great Nosferatu Lich's Castle

863856.effect: You can only equip this card to 1 Zombie monster you control. The equipped monster cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects. If the activation of this card is negated and sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; its effects are negated until the end of this turn, also it loses 1000 ATK and DEF. You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "The Great Nosferatu Lich, Fushioh Richie" from your Deck to your GY.
863856.name: Staff of the Nosferatu Lich

863860.effect: Target 1 Zombie monster you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your GY. If the activation of this card is negated and sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-down monster you control; change it to face-up Defense Position, then, if that monster is not "Fushioh Richie", destroy it.
863860.name: Calling of the Nosferatu Lich

2011.effect:
When this monster destroys the following number of monsters as a result of battle, the following effects are activated in order:
One: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, negate the activation and effects of all Spell and Trap Cards that target this card and destroy them.
Two: You can Special Summon 1 "Fushioh Richie" from your hand or your Deck by Tributing this card during your Main Phase.
2011.name: Great Dezard

1701.effect: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned from your hand or your Deck by Tributing 1 "Great Dezard" that has fulfilled the condition. You can flip this card into face-down Defense Position once per turn during your Main Phase. As long as this monster remains face-up on the field, negate the activation and effects of all Spell and Trap Cards that target this card and destroy them. When this card is flipped face-up, you can Special Summon 1 Zombie-Type monster from your Graveyard.
1701.name: Fushioh Richie

1847116.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Kozmo" card.)Once per turn: You can target 1 "Kozmo" monster you control; all monsters you currently control become that monster's Level until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field). You can tribute 1 "Kozmo" monster you control; Special Summon from your Deck 2 "Kozmo" monsters with a different name, but same level as the tributed monster, also negate their effects until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Kozmikal Battlecrusade" once per turn.
1847116.name: Kozmikal Battlecrusade

1847327.effect: 2 Level 9 "Kozmo" monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned: All non "Kozmo" or "Kozmikal" monsters are sent to GY. Cannot be targeted by an opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can banish 1 face-up "Kozmo" or "Kozmikal" monster; Your opponent cannot activate card effects until the end of this turn. If this card has "Kozmo Dark Eclipser" as an Xyz Material, it gains this effect.● You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Until the end of this turn, each time a "Kozmo" or "Kozmikal" monster would banish a card, you can send the top 2 cards from your Deck to your GY instead. You can only use this effect of "Kozmikal Dark Disrupter" once per turn.
1847327.name: Kozmikal Dark Disrupter

1847349.effect: 2 Level 10 "Kozmo" monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned: "Kozmo" and "Kozmikal" cards cannot be destroyed or banished until the end of the next turn. Cannot be targeted by an opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Until the end of this turn, neither player can activate card effects, except "Kozmo" and "Kozmikal" card effects. If this card has "Kozmo Dark Eclipser" as an Xyz Material, it gains this effect.● You can activate the effects of face-up monsters you control with "Kozmo" or "Kozmikal" in their original names, as Quick Effects.
1847349.name: Kozmikal Dark Nebula

1847303.effect: 2 Level 8 "Kozmo" monstersWhen this card is Xyz Summoned: All face-up "Kozmo" and "Kozmikal" monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK/DEF (even if this card leaves the field). Cannot be targeted by an opponent's card effects. Once per turn, if the number of face-up "Kozmo" and "Kozmikal" cards you control its higher than the number of cards in your hand (Quick Effect): You can destroy cards on the field up to the difference. If this card has "Kozmo Dark Destroyer" as an Xyz Material, it gains this effect.● You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card: You can Special Summon as many "Kozmikal Tokens" (Machine/DARK/Level 12/ATK 0/DEF 0) as possible. You can only use this effect of "Kozmikal Dark Oblivion" once per turn.
1847303.name: Kozmikal Dark Oblivion

1770132.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster you control: Equip this card to it. The equipped monster gains 1500 ATK and deals piercing battle damage. If the equipped monster is targeted by a card effect; Negate the effect and send this card to the GY, and if you do, equip this card to a monster your opponent controls. An opponents monster who is equipped with this card loses 1500 ATK and must battle during the Battle Phase. You can only use each effect of "Number 128: Dark Knight of Eternal Power" once per turn.
1770132.name: Number 128: Dark Knight of Eternal Power
1770132.treated_as: Number 128: Dark Knight of Eternal Power

1770162.effect:
2 Level 1 monsters
You can detach 2 materials from this card: Set "Fiendish Chain" directly from your deck. You can only use this effect of "Nuber 129: Lost Chained Dragon" once per turn.
1770162.name: Number 129: Lost Chained Dragon

1770200.effect:
2 Level 5 monsters
All FIRE monsters you control gain 500 ATK. If a FIRE monster leaves the field because of an opponents card: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monsters ATK, then this card gains ATK equal to the damage dealt. You can only use this effect of "Number 130: Intense Fire Guard" once per turn. Your opponents monsters must declare an attack on this card.
1770200.name: Number 130: Intense Inferno Guard

1770247.effect: 2 Level 3 Rock monstersFace-up "Chronomaly" Xyz Monsters on your side of the field cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster who's ATK is different to their original ATK. Once per turn, you can Special Summon from the Extra Deck, 1 "Chronomaly" Xyz Monster with a different name from this card, by using this card as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer this cards materials to the Summoned monster.). You can only use each effect of "Number 131: Chronomaly Sky Fortress" once per turn.
1770247.name: Number 131: Chronomaly Sky Fortress

1798500.effect: 2 Level 8 Machine monstersYou can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many Spell/Trap cards on the field; destroy them. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle; attach that monster to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Number 132: Gimmick Puppet Mask Changer" once per turn.
1798500.name: Number 132: Gimmick Puppet Mask Changer

1771197.effect:
4 Level 8 monsters
Must be Xyz Summoned. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can activate this effect; banish all other cards on the field, also this card cannot attack for the rest of this turn. If this card declares an attack on an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; this card gains 1000 ATK during damage calculation only. If this card is destroyed by an opponent's card effect and sent to the GY: You can banish this card, then target 1 Level 8 monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Number 133: Thermonuclear Godzilla" once per turn.
1771197.name: Number 133: Thermonuclear Godzilla

1773109.effect:
2 Level 2 Beast monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card: All "Melffy" monsters you control gain 1000 ATK, until the End Phase. If another face-up "Melffy" monster you control returns to your hand (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Number 134: Melffy Noodle Draggy" once per turn.
1773109.name: Number 134: Melffy Noodle Draggy

1773393.effect:
2 Level 4 LIGHT monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level/Rank 6 or 7 Dragon monster from your hand or GY, but make its ATK/DEF 0. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card and/or Tribute 1 Dragon monster in your hand, and if you do, draw cards equal to the number of monsters you sent to the GY this way, also this card gains that many Ranks. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, while you control a LIGHT Dragon monster, its ATK becomes 0. You can only use each effect of "Number 135: Hieratic Dragon Empress of Nerfertiti" once per turn.
1773393.name: Number 135: Hieratic Dragon Empress of Nerfertiti
1773393.treated_as: Number 135: Hieratic Dragon Empress of Nerfertiti

1773407.effect: 2 Level 8 monstersOnce per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Dinowrestler Mega Calindactyl" by using a "Dinowrestler" Link Monster you control as material. If this card battles, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. When Fusion or Synchro Summoning a "Dinowrestler" monster, you can also use 1 "Dinowrestler" monster in your Deck as material, and if you do: Lose 2000 LP. During your opponents Main Phase, you can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; it must declare an attack on this monster during the Battle Phase. You can only use each effect of "Number 136: Dinowrestler Mega Calindactyl" once per turn.
1773407.name: Number 136: Dinowrestler Mega Calindactyl

1793125.effect: 3 Level 8 monstersYou can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster you control: It gains 1000 ATK, until the end of the turn, and can make a second attack during the Battle Phase this turn, also, this card cannot attack directly for the rest of the turn. You can only use this effect of "Number 137: Asphalt Assaulter" once per turn.
1793125.name: Number 137: Asphalt Assaulter

1575863.effect: If your opponent takes effect damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Firewild Lava Lynx", and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Lava Lynx" once per turn.
1575863.name: Firewild Lava Lynx

1575923.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Firewild Flaring Ferret", and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100. If your opponent takes effect damage, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leave the field. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Flaring Ferret" once per turn.
1575923.name: Firewild Flaring Ferret

1575955.effect: When exactly 1 "Firewild" monster is Normal or Special Summoned to your field, except "Firewild Conflagration Coyote" (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. If your opponent takes effect damage by a "Firewild" card's effect, except by this card's effect: Target 1 Set card your opponent controls; destroy that target. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Conflagration Coyote" once per turn.
1575955.name: Firewild Conflagration Coyote

1576727.effect: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 face-up "Firewild" monster on the field; it gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn, and if it does, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level or Link Rating x 100. If you control a "Firewild" monster other than "Firewild Burning Bull" and this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Burning Bull" once per turn.
1576727.name: Firewild Burning Bull

1576084.effect: If a "Firewild" Link Monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent, also any battle damage inflicts to your opponent by this effect is treated as effect damage instead. If you control a "Firewild" Link Monster, while this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Firewild" card in your GY, except "Firewild Torching Tiger"; shuffle that target into the Deck, and if you do,Special Summon this card to your zone a "Firewild" Link Monster points to, and if you do that, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Link Rating of 1 "Firewild" Link Monster that points to this card. You can only use this effect of "Firewild Torching Tiger" once per turn.
1576084.name: Firewild Torching Tiger

1580072.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your zone a "Firewild" Link Monster points to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Link Rating of 1 "Firewild" Link Monster that points to this card. You can only Special Summon "Firewild Glowing Griffon" once per turn this way. If your opponent takes effect damage by a "Firewild" card's effect, except by this card's effect: Target 1 "Firewild" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Defense Position, but its effects are negated, also, for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Pyro monsters. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Glowing Griffon" once per turn.
1580072.name: Firewild Glowing Griffon

1576910.effect: Activate 1 of these effects.● Add 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100.● Special Summon 1 "Firewild" monster from your GY to your zone a Link Monster points to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Link Rating of 1 "Firewild" Link Monster that points to the monster Special Summoned by this effect x 100.You can only activate 1 "Firewild Bonfire Burst" per turn.
1576910.name: Firewild Bonfire Burst

1578482.effect: Send 1 "Firewild" monster from your hand or field to the GY; draw 2 cards, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the sent monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Pyro monsters. You can only activate 1 "Firewild Charring Claw" per turn.
1578482.name: Firewild Charring Claw

1576937.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Pyro monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) If this card in the Field Zone is destroyed by card effect: You can destroy 1 card on the field, then if the card destroyed by this effect was a monster, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's Level/Rank or Link Rating x 100. You can only activate 1 "Firewild Soot Savanna" per turn.
1576937.name: Firewild Soot Savanna

1590167.effect: Special Summon 1 "Firewild" monster from your Deck, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Level x 100. If you control a "Firewild" Link Monster, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Firewild Spark Sleep" per turn. If you control no cards, you can activate this card from your hand.
1590167.name: Firewild Spark Sleep

1576949.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated while you control a "Firewild" Link Monster: Negate the activation, and if you negated a monster's effect, destroy that monster, and if you do that, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's Level/Rank or Link Rating x 100. If your opponent takes effect damage, while this card is in your GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 "Firewild Solar Storm" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1576949.name: Firewild Solar Storm

1576780.effect: 1 non-Link "Firewild" monsterIf this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Firewild" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand. If a "Firewild" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead, then inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each card that would be destroyed. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Detonate Deer" once per turn.
1576780.name: Firewild Detonate Deer

1576815.effect: 2 Pyro monstersDuring your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Firewild" monster from your hand to your zone a "Firewild" Link Monster points to. (Quick Effect): You can target 2 cards (1 from each field); destroy them, then, if a "Firewild" monster you control was destroyed by this effect, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. You can only use each effect of "Firewild Volcano Vulcan" once per turn.
1576815.name: Firewild Volcano Vulcan

1576832.effect: 2+ Pyro monstersIf this card is Link Summoned: You can Set 1 "Firewild" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck, but it cannot be activated this turn. Each time your opponent takes damage by another "Firewild" monster's effect: This card gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase this turn (max. 2). During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: You can banish 1 other "Firewild" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card from your GY, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the banished monster's Level or Link Rating x 100. You can only use this effect of "Firewild Flaming Fenrir" once per turn.
1576832.name: Firewild Flaming Fenrir

1578574.effect: 3+ "Firewild" monstersMust be Link Summoned or Special Summoned by its own effect, and cannot be Special Summoned by other way. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the number of cards destroyed by this effect x100, also this card cannot attack this turn. While this card is co-linked to a "Firewild" Link Monster, neither player can target this card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by battle, while your LP are higher than your opponent's. While your LP are higher than your opponent's, this card gains ATK equal to the difference. While your LP are lower than your opponent's, this card loses ATK equal to the difference. During the next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY.
1578574.name: Firewild Pyres Phoenix

1842217.effect: 2+ Pyro monstersWhen this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 Pyro Link Monster in your GY, except "Firewild Magmatic Maahes"; Special Summon it but negate its effects until the End Phase, also it cannot attack as long as it remains face-up on the field, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Link Rating x 100. Can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each, also monsters your opponent controls cannot attack, except to attack this card. Each time your opponent takes damage by another "Firewild" monster's effect: This card gains ATK equal to the damage they took. You can only control 1 face-up "Firewild Magmatic Maahes".
1842217.name: Firewild Magmatic Maahes

1832240.effect: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Dark Arts" card you can make this card's name become "Dark Arts Maiden" or "Dark Arts Sorcerer", or, if you control a face-up "Dark Arts Maiden" or a face-up "Dark Arts Sorcerer" monster, you can add 1 "Dark Arts" card from your Deck instead, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Dark Arts" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Apprentice" once per turn.
1832240.name: Dark Arts Apprentice

1832212.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can discard 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your hand, or, banish 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts Sorcerer" from your hand, Deck or GY, or, if you control a face-up "Dark Arts Sorcerer" you can add 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand instead, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Dark Arts" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Maiden" once per turn. You can only control 1 face-up monster whose original name is "Dark Arts Maiden".
1832212.name: Dark Arts Maiden

1832500.effect: If you control no monsters, or if you control "Dark Arts Maiden" or "Dark Arts Sorcerer": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You only can Special Summon "Dark Arts Manifestation" once per turn this way. You only can Special Summon "Dark Arts Manifestation" once per turn this way. Once per turn: You can banish this card from your hand or field, then pay 1000 LP; add 1 "Dark Arts" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Dark Arts" monsters.
1832500.name: Dark Arts Manifestation

1832244.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your hand, but make its ATK/DEF 0. If you control a face-up "Dark Arts Maiden" or a face-up "Dark Arts Sorcerer" monster, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Dark Arts" monster from your Deck instead, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Dark Arts" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Researcher" once per turn.
1832244.name: Dark Arts Researcher

1832213.effect: If this card its Summoned: You can discard 1 "Dark Arts" Spell or Trap from your hand, or, banish 1 "Dark Arts" Spell or Trap from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts Maiden" from your hand, Deck or GY, or, if you control a face-up "Dark Arts Maiden" you can add 1 "Dark Arts" Spell or Trap from your Deck or GY to your hand instead, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Dark Arts" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Sorcerer" once per turn. You can only control 1 face-up monster whose original name is "Dark Arts Sorcerer".
1832213.name: Dark Arts Sorcerer

1832356.effect: Send the top 3 cards from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts Maiden" or 1 "Dark Arts Sorcerer" from your hand or GY, but negate its effects, and make its ATK/DEF 0. If this card its banished by a "Dark Arts" card effect: You can banish another "Dark Arts" card from your GY; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Fate" once per turn.
1832356.name: Dark Arts Fate

1832534.effect: Draw 2 cards, then banish 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your hand, or, if you do not have any in your hand, banish your entire hand. You can only activate 1 "Dark Arts Influence" per turn. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then banish 1 "Dark Arts" monster in your hand or GY whose original name its "Dark Arts Sorcerer" or "Dark Arts Maiden"; add 1 "Dark Arts" card that has not been activated this turn from your deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Influence" once per turn.
1832534.name: Dark Arts Influence

1832340.effect: Target 1 Level 4 or lower Spellcaster monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then discard 1 "Dark Arts" card from your hand. You can only activate 1 "Dark Arts Justice" per turn. Once per turn, if this card is in your GY: You can banish it, then tribute 1 "Dark Arts" monster; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your Deck, but negate its effects and also banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Justice" once per turn.
1832340.name: Dark Arts Justice

1832253.effect: You can target 1 face-up "Dark Arts" monster you control, then destroy this card; the targeted monster its treated as a Tuner monster while it is face-up on the field, or, if the targeted monster name its either "Dark Arts Maiden" or "Dark Arts Sorcerer", you can destroy that card, then, Special Summon 1 Level 6 or lower "Dark Arts" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck instead (This Special Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon.). You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Research" up to twice per turn.
1832253.name: Dark Arts Research

1832257.effect: You can target 1 face-up "Dark Arts" monster you control, then destroy this card, immediatly after this effect resolves, Fusion Summon 1 "Dark Arts" Fusion Monster using that targeted card and monsters from your hand or field as fusion materials, or, if the targeted monster name its either "Dark Arts Maiden" or "Dark Arts Sorcerer", you can destroy that card, then, Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck instead (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.). You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Reunion" up to twice per turn.
1832257.name: Dark Arts Reunion

1832362.effect: You can banish 1 "Dark Arts" card from your field, except "Dragged Down by the Dark Arts"; Until the end of this turn, whenever you would take damage you gain that amount of Life Points instead. You can only activate 1 "Dragged Down by the Dark Arts" per turn. Once per turn, if this card is in your GY: You can banish this card and 1 other "Dark Arts" card with a different name than this card from your GY, any damage that you will take this turn its halved. You can only use this effect of "Dragged Down by the Dark Arts" once per turn.
1832362.name: Dragged Down by the Dark Arts
1832362.treated_as: Dragged Down by the Dark Arts

1832262.effect: When this card its activated: You can add 1 "Dark Arts" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Promised Land of the Dark Arts" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Dark Arts" monsters. While this card is face-up on the field "Dark Arts" monsters you control that were Special Summoned from the Extra Deck cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn: Send the top 3 cards from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your hand.
1832262.name: Promised Land of the Dark Arts
1832262.treated_as: Promised Land of the Dark Arts

1832377.effect: If a card would negate the Normal or Special Summon of a "Dark Arts" monster(s), or the activation of a "Dark Arts" card or effect: You can banish 1 "Dark Arts" card from your hand or GY; Negate the activation of that card, then look at your opponent's Extra Deck and Main deck, also banish facedown all cards in their Extra Deck and/or Main Deck with the same original name as that card.
1832377.name: Dark Arts Punishment

1832329.effect: 2 "Dark Arts" monsters + 1 "Dark Arts" Fusion MonsterThis card cannot be Summoned using "Dark Arts Reunion". Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by Tributing the above cards you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). If this card its Fusion Summoned you can shuffle all of your banished cards into the Deck, and if you do, this card gains 200 ATK/DEF for each "Dark Arts" card shuffled into the Main Deck by this effect. Once per turn: You can tribute 1 "Dark Arts" monster you control; Special Summon up to 3 Level 6 or lower "Dark Arts" banished monsters, but negate their effects.
1832329.name: Dark Arts Death Anima

1832315.effect: 2 "Dark Arts" monstersIf this card its Fusion Summoned: You can shuffle up to 3 banished "Dark Arts" cards back into the deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Dark Arts Reaper" once per turn. Once per turn: You can tribute 1 "Dark Arts" monster; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts" banished monster, but negate its effects. Once per turn: If this card attacks an opponent's monster, you can banish up to 5 "Dark Arts" cards from your GY; this card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each card banished by this effect.
1832315.name: Dark Arts Reaper

1832292.effect: 1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "Dark Arts" Synchro MonsterIf this card its Synchro Summoned: You can banish 1 Level 6 or higher "Dark Arts" monster from your Extra Deck or GY; destroy all other cards on the field. The first time this card would leave the field it does not. Once per turn: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, shuffle them back in, also this card's maximum number of attacks per Battle Phase this turn equals the number of "Dark Arts" monsters excavated. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s) on the field: You can negate the effect, and if you do, destroy it.
1832292.name: Dark Arts Fear Manifestation

1832274.effect: 1 Tuner + 1 "Dark Arts" non-Tuner monsterIf this card is Synchro Summoned: You can banish 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your GY; destroy up to 2 cards on the field. You can destroy 1 face-up "Dark Arts" Spell or Trap, then target 1 Level 6 or lower "Dark Arts" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Dark Arts Wraith" once per turn.
1832274.name: Dark Arts Wraith

1832234.effect: 2 "Dark Arts" monsters, including 1 "Dark Arts Maiden" or 1 "Dark Arts Sorcerer"This card's name becomes "Dark Arts Maiden" and "Dark Arts Sorcerer" while on the field, in the GY, or banished. If this card its Link Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Dark Arts" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Dark Arts" monsters. You can tribute 1 "Dark Arts" monster that this card points to; Special Summon 1 "Dark Arts" monster from your Hand or GY, or, set 1 "Dark Arts" Spell or Trap directly from your hand, Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Dark Arts Masters" once per turn.
1832234.name: Dark Arts Masters

1380766.effect: You can target 1 other "Remnant" card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. Then, if the "Remnant" card you targeted was a Normal Monster, you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Final Battle of the Remnant" once that turn.
1380766.name: Final Battle of the Remnant

1380990.effect: While you control a "Remnant" monster: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent controls; negate its effects, and if you do, destroy it. If you control a "Remnant" Fusion Monster, you can banish that card instead. You can only use this effect of "Remnant Assault from Orbit" once per turn.
1380990.name: Remnant Assault from Orbit

1382638.effect: Target 1 "Remnant" card in your GY, except "Remnant Rescue Mission"; add it to your hand. Then, if the "Remnant" card you targeted was a Normal Monster, you can draw 1 card. You can only activate this effect of "Remnant Rescue Mission" once per turn.
1382638.name: Remnant Rescue Mission

1382722.effect: When this card is activated, while you control no "Captured Remnant" monsters: You can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; banish that card. If you control a "Remnant" Normal Monster, you can Special Summon that monster instead, also, it becomes a "Captured Remnant" monster, but it cannot declare an attack, also, when this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. You can only activate this effect of "Captured Remnant" once per turn.
1382722.name: Captured Remnant

1381019.effect: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing "Remnant" monsters from your hand, field and/or GY as Fusion Materials. If a "Remnant" card you control is destroyed by card effect, while this card is in your GY: Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field, also, send 1 "Remnant" Monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only activate this effect of "Remnant Arrival" once per turn. If you control no monsters and this card was Set from the hand, you can activate this card the turn it was Set.
1381019.name: Remnant Arrival

1482634.effect: This card is treated as a "Remnant" card while face-up on the field. When this card is activated: You can send 1 "Remnant" monster from your Deck to the GY, then, if that monster in your GY is a Normal Monster, you can send 1 additional "Remnant" monster from your Deck to the GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 other card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Set 1 "Remnant" Trap directly from your Deck to your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only activate 1 "Infested Battleground" per turn.
1482634.name: Infested Battleground

1477661.effect: Add 1 "Remnant" monster from your Deck to your hand, then you can reveal 1 card in your hand or 1 Set card on your field. If the card revealed by this effect is a "Remnant" card, you can return 1 of your banished "Remnant" cards to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Remnant Climax" once per turn.
1477661.name: Remnant Climax

1390843.effect: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while it is on the field or in the GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Remnant" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is destroyed by a "Remnant" card effect: Send 1 "Remnant" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Remnant Forces" once per turn.
1390843.name: Remnant Forces

1471787.effect: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while it is on the field or in the GY. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 "Remnant" Spell/Trap in your GY; Set it in your Spell/Trap Zone, and if you do, all "Remnant" monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can only use this effect of "Chosen Remnants" once per turn.
1471787.name: Chosen Remnants

1487232.effect: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while it is on the field or in the GY. You can discard this card, then target 1 "Remnant" monster you control; that monster gains an additional attack during each Battle Phase this turn, also all "Remnant" monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK. You can only use this effect of "Remnant Mecha" once per turn.
1487232.name: Remnant Mecha

1591340.effect:
2 Normal WATER monsters
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while it is on the field. If a "Remnant" card you control is destroyed by a "Remnant" card effect, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position, also gain 1000 LP. You can only use this effect of "Remnant Hope" once per turn.
1591340.name: Remnant Hope

1383588.effect: 1 "Remnant" monster + 1 WATER Normal MonsterWhen your opponent activates a card or effect: You can negate the effects of all monsters your opponent currently controls. The first time this card would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. If this card you control is destroyed by a "Remnant" card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Psychic monster from your GY, and if you do, it gains 500 ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn. You can only use each effect of "Remnant Commando" once per turn.
1383588.name: Remnant Commando

1383142.effect:
1 "Remnant" monster + 1 Psychic Normal Monster
The activation and effects of "Remnant" Trap cards activated on your field cannot be negated. Once per turn: You can target 2 banished "Remnant" cards and 1 card on the field; return those banished targets to the GY, and if you do, shuffle the target on the field into the Deck. If this card you control is destroyed by a "Remnant" card effect: You can target 1 "Remnant" card in your GY; add that card to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that card's name for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Remnant Mecha MK-3" once per turn.
1383142.name: Remnant Mecha MK-3

1383523.effect: 1 "Remnant" monster + 1 WATER Fusion MonsterThis card can attack all monsters your opponent controls during each Battle Phase once each. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Remnant" card you control; destroy that card, also, switch all monsters your opponent controls to Defense Position and all monsters your opponent currently controls lose 500 ATK/DEF. If this card is destroyed by battle or by a "Remnant" card effect: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished Psychic monsters, and if you do, it gains 500 ATK/DEF until the end of the next turn. You can only use each effect of "Remnant Vessel USCSS Voyager" once per turn.
1383523.name: Remnant Vessel USCSS Voyager

1818659.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "STRGRL" monster from your hand. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 Link Monster Card in either Spell & Trap Zone to the GY, then Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except LIGHT monsters. You can only use each effect of "STRGRL Maki" once per turn.
1818659.name: STRGRL Maki

1821266.effect: If this card is Special Summoned: You can look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Deck, then place them on the top of the Deck in any order. You can only use each of the following effects of "STRGRL Imari" once per turn, also you cannot activate the following effects of "STRGRL Imari" in the same Chain.● If a Link Monster Card(s) is placed face-up in either Spell & Trap Zone: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field.● If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can draw 1 card.
1821266.name: STRGRL Imari

1821341.effect: If this card is Special Summoned from the Deck, it cannot be used as Link Material. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY; excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is a "STRGRL" monster, Special Summon it. If it wasn't a "STRGRL" monster, or couldn't be Special Summoned, place it on the bottom of the Deck. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Cosmic Chef Hiroo" once per turn.
1821341.name: STRGRL Cosmic Chef Hiroo

1818636.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can choose up to 2 "STRGRL" monsters with different names from your Deck, then place them on the top of the Deck in any order. If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can send 1 Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY; Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use each effect of "STRGRL Space Runner Rai" once per turn.
1818636.name: STRGRL Space Runner Rai

1821325.effect: If you control a "STRGRL" Link Monster Card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is banished: You can add 1 "STRGRL" monster from your Deck to your hand, whose original card name is the same as a monster that was not yet Special Summoned this turn. You can only use each effect of "STRGRL Guardian Gryphia" once per turn.
1821325.name: STRGRL Guardian Gryphia
1821325.pendulum_effect: If you did not Special Summon 3 or more "STRGRL" monsters from your hand this turn, you cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "STRGRL" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. Once per turn, if a Link Monster is Special Summoned to either Main Monster Zone: You can target 1 "STRGRL" monster in your GY; place it on the bottom of your Deck, then draw 1 card.

1821310.effect: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; it loses 1000 ATK, then if its ATK has been reduced to 100 or less as a result, destroy it. If this card is banished: You can target 1 "STRGRL" monster in your GY; place it on the top of the Deck. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Moon Gang Soshi" once per turn.
1821310.name: STRGRL Moon Gang Soshi
1821310.pendulum_effect: If a Link Monster is Special Summoned to your Main Monster Zone (except during the Damage Step): You can banish 1 "STRGRL" monster from your Deck, then negate the effects of 1 face-up monster on the field. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Moon Gang Soshi" once per turn.

1821375.effect: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "STRGRL" monsterThis card's original ATK is equal to the number of face-up Spells/Traps on the field x 500. You can banish 1 card from your hand; take 1 Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, and either place it in your Pendulum Zone or Special Summon it, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Guardian Vydra" once per turn.
1821375.name: STRGRL Guardian Vydra

1821282.effect: 1 Thunder Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsterIf this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 monster that a Link Monster in the Extra Monster Zone points to. If this card is banished: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "STRGRL" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "STRGRL Sentinel" once per turn.
1821282.name: STRGRL Sentinel

1821361.effect: 1 "STRGRL" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "STRGRL" monsterIf this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it. If this card in the Monster Zone is banished: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
1821361.name: STRGRL Code Daki
1821361.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 Link Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it, but its effects are negated.

1821354.effect: 1 "STRGRL" Tuner monster + 1+ non-Tuner monsterOnce per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster you control; it gains 500 ATK. If a Machine monster is sent to either GY: You can Special Summon 1 face-up Cyberse Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Militant Cydonia" once per turn.
1821354.name: STRGRL Militant Cydonia

1821415.effect: 1 "STRGRL" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "STRGRL" monsterMust be Synchro Summoned. If this card is Synchro Summon using a Pendulum Monster(s) as Synchro Material, this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If a "STRGRL" monster(s) is Summoned: Increase this card's Level by 1. Once per turn, while this card's Level is 12 or more: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned this turn: Return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 face-up Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone.
1821415.name: STRGRL Apparition

1824963.effect: 1 "STRGRL" Tuner + 2+ non-Tuner monstersOnce per turn, if you control 2 Pendulum Monster Cards in your Pendulum Zones, including a Synchro Pendulum Monster with a Scale of 10 or higher, you can also Synchro Summon "STRGRL Cyber Maki" by banishing materials from your hand or GY, including "STRGRL Maki". If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; banish it, and if you do, all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls loses 500 ATK. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your banished "STRGRL" monsters; Special Summon it, then place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
1824963.name: STRGRL Cyber Maki
1824963.pendulum_effect: Once per turn, when your opponent's monster declares an attack: You can banish 1 other "STRGRL" card from your GY or face-up from your Spell & Trap Zone; negate that attack, and if you do, end the Battle Phase.

1818561.effect: 1 non-Link "STRGRL" monsterWhen this card is Link Summoned: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "STRGRL" monster from your Deck, and if you do, place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Reality Gateway" once per turn. While this Monster Card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon Pendulum and Link Monsters from the Extra Deck in this card's column of your Main Monster Zone as if a Link Monster points to it.
1818561.name: STRGRL Reality Gateway

1821275.effect: 2 "STRGRL" monstersDuring your Main Phase: You can place this card in your Spell & Trap Zone face-up as a Continuous Spell Card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 non-Thunder "STRGRL" monster from your hand or GY. If a "STRGRL" monster(s) is Summoned to a zone this card points to, OR if a "STRGRL" monster(s) is Summoned to this card's adjacent column of your Main Monster Zone, while this Link Monster Card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "STRGRL Destiny Guide" once per turn. While this Link Monster Card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon Pendulum and Link Monsters to this card's adjacent columns of your Main Monster Zone as if a Link Monster points to it.
1821275.name: STRGRL Destiny Guide

1821297.effect: 2 Thunder, Psychic, and/or Cyberse monstersDuring your Main Phase: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY; place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 "STRGRL" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Bubbles Mode" once per turn. While this Link Monster Card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon Pendulum and Link Monsters from the Extra Deck to this card's right adjacent column of your Main Monster Zone as if a Link Monster points to it.
1821297.name: STRGRL Bubbles Mode

1821398.effect: 2 Thunder and/or Psychic monstersDuring your Main Phase: You can place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 "STRGRL" Pendulum Monster from your Pendulum Zone. If this card in your Main Monster Zone is co-linked: You can target 1 face-up non-Link monster on the field; increase its Level/Rank by 1. You can only use each effect of "STRGRL Buttercup Mode" once per turn. While this Link Monster Card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon Pendulum and Link Monsters to this card's right adjacent column of your Main Monster Zone as if a Link Monster points to it.
1821398.name: STRGRL Buttercup Mode

1821409.effect: 2+ "STRGRL" monsters, including a Machine monsterIf this card is co-linked, your opponent cannot target other "STRGRL" monsters you control with card effects. During your Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, and if you do, banish up to 3 cards in the GYs, including a "STRGRL" monster (min. 1). You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Blossom Mode" once per turn. While this Link Monster Card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon Pendulum and Link Monsters to this card's left adjacent column of your Main Monster Zone as if a Link Monster points to it.
1821409.name: STRGRL Blossom Mode

1821379.effect: 2+ "STRGRL" monstersWhen this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "STRGRL" monster from your Deck, and if you do, equip this card to that Special Summoned monster. You can only use this effect of "STRGRL Black Rain" once per turn. A monster equipped with this card gains 500 ATK for each monster in this card's column and adjacent columns of your Main Monster Zone. While this Link Monster Card is face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon Pendulum and Link Monsters from the Extra Deck to this card's column and adjacent columns of your Main Monster Zone as if a Link Monster points to it.
1821379.name: STRGRL Black Rain
